query:
{
  main_1 as var(func: eq(judgment_id, "J_yuTHbJoBE4wsznJVYMGm"))
  cite_79b45c0d403b as var(func: eq(title, "T. Arivandandam v. T.V. Satyapal [1978] 1 SCR 742 : (1977) 4 SCC 467 - held applicable."))
  cite_a32d95f0207e as var(func: eq(title, "Satti Paradesi Samadhi & Pillayar Temple v. M. Sankuntala [2014] 9 SCR 221 : (2015) 5 SCC 674"))
  judge_506a299665cd as var(func: eq(name, "Justice K. M. Joseph")) @filter(type(Judge))
  judge_27756f5a523a as var(func: eq(name, "Justice B. R. Gavai")) @filter(type(Judge))
  adv_fa44ad1b3dc1 as var(func: eq(name, "Mr. C. A. Sundaram")) @filter(type(Advocate) AND eq(advocate_type, "petitioner"))
  adv_fbd891e84642 as var(func: eq(name, "Mr. P. S. Narasimha")) @filter(type(Advocate) AND eq(advocate_type, "respondant"))
  adv_4676dbbc0131 as var(func: eq(name, "Ms. Madhavi Divan")) @filter(type(Advocate) AND eq(advocate_type, "respondant"))
  outcome_4b5e1a039d2a as var(func: eq(name, "Respondent Won")) @filter(type(Outcome))
  duration_effb40d59fe0 as var(func: eq(duration, "2019-11-10 to 2021-01-29")) @filter(type(CaseDuration))
}
